channel.title: Compile error please help!

item.title: Compile error please help!
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

Well i want to run my client and compile somethings i edited in order to play but it still didnâ€™t found it my java is located at: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24

the compile file text: @echo off @TITLE Reality's compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
